import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { RootState } from '../store'; const Profile: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { player, characters } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.game); const unlockedCharacters = characters.filter(char => char.isUnlocked); const nextLevelExp = player.level * 100; // 100 exp points per level const expProgress = (player.experience / nextLevelExp) * 100; return (
{/* Top Navigation */}

Profile

monetization_on {player.coins}
diamond {player.diamonds}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Player Info */}
person

{player.name}

military_tech {player.rank}
{/* Level Progress */}
Level {player.level} {player.experience}/{nextLevelExp} XP

Win battles to gain experience and level up!

{/* Stats */}
Characters
{unlockedCharacters.length}/{characters.length}
Battles Won
0
Win Rate
0%
Tournament Wins
0
{/* Character Collection */}

Character Collection

{characters.map((character) => (
person

{character.name}

Lv.{character.level}

{!character.isUnlocked && character.requiredLevel && (
lock Level {character.requiredLevel}
)} {!character.isUnlocked && character.isPaid && (
diamond Premium
)}
))}
); }; export default Profile;
